channel.title: maroon-series.art - Patch Notes
channel.description: Patch notes for Mar00n series site.

item.description: - Imported the entirety of signalwars.neocities.com as a companion, satiric microsite — content, pages, and assets preserved. - Integrated cross-site references so chapter releases can reference Signal Wars artifacts directly. - Updated the About / Context page to describe Mar00n as a distributed narrative project (novel + multiple companion sites). - Clarified project scope: novel (maroon-series.art), resistance hub (dumpthis.sh), corporate persona (newlife2084.com), and satiric companion (signalwars.neocities.com). - Signal Wars content remains distinct in tone — satiric, transmedia, and synchronized with chapter drops. - See `about.html` for author statement and contact details.

- Created residueb.html — transition page with signal-loss aesthetic. - Implements line-by-line display of warning gateways with dynamic timing based on text length. - Enhanced CYBERPUNK CULTURE growth animation — slowed to 2.5s with aggressive multi-axis glitch effects (skew, translate, color channels). - Added 2-second extended display duration for beloved introduction text for narrative impact. - Implemented TV signal tear-off effect for final reveal glitch-out (Cyrus Null, SIGNAL WARS, AM 1045). - Pure black (#000000) and white (#ffffff) aesthetic — minimalist, stark presentation. - Added AM 1045 station identifier below SIGNAL WARS in final reveal. - All three name elements glitch off in unison with color channel displacement and scale distortion.

- Added a surveillance-style portrait of Sarah to Chapter 01, positioned in the pod description. - Portrait is centered and styled with desaturation, scanline overlay, and chromatic-glitch layers. - Added a brief invert-flicker glitch so the image briefly inverts colors then returns. - Animations respect `prefers-reduced-motion`.

- Published Chapter 05: Residue — accessible via Prologue. - Marcus investigates digital remnants and uncovers the truth about Sarah's fabricated memories. - Updated Prologue chapter navigation — added #RESIDUE, teased #CONTACT. - Enhanced purple-lavender aesthetic with surveillance monitoring theme. - Added custom surveillance targeting cursor (red default, cyan hover) to the Neo Sentinel.
- Published Chapter 04: Possession — accessible via Prologue.

- Updated external mask site newlife2084.com — added founders page. - Valentine's Day content/theme added to New Life pages. - Added SPNS page (information / demo). - Integrated interactive map asset on New Life site. - Implemented site-wide hamburger menu for mobile navigation. - UX tweaks for mobile navigation and menu animations. - Map performance and responsive layout improvements.

- Published Chapter 03 (`Mar00n/maintenance/`) — 5 progressive iterations with supporting assets. - Added `maintenance.html`, `maintenance2.html`, `maintenance3.html`, `maintenance4.html`, `maintenance5.html` — chapter content iterations. - Added `Mar00n/maintenance/glbl.css` — global styling with vector/phosphor theme, amber color scheme, CRT effects. - Added `Mar00n/maintenance/js/bezel-reflections.js` — CRT bezel light spill effect simulation (387 lines). - Added `Mar00n/maintenance/css/` subfolder with `maroon-glitch.css` and `substratum.css` supporting stylesheets. - Iterative development through 5 progressive versions of maintenance chapter. - Enhanced CRT/phosphor visual effects with amber terminal aesthetic and bezel glow animations. - Created backup of original `substratumb.html` before replacement. - Organized maintenance chapter files into dedicated subfolder structure.
- Published `Mar00n/substratum.html` — chapter 2 upload.
- Published `Mar00n/processing3b.html` — chapter 1 break.
- Published `Mar00n/processing3.html` — chapter 1 continued.
- Published `Mar00n/processing2.html` — chapter 1 continued.
- Compact terminal-style patchnote template added to `updates.html`. - Reduced padding and font sizes for compact display. - Clarified duplication instruction in comment above.
- Applied global styling and font choices across the site.
- Added site assets: `assets/` JS & CSS files (matrix, menu, cursor, styles).
- Added `Mar00n/processing*.html` demo pages and styles under `Mar00n/`.
- Created `updates.html` — central patch notes page.
- Added `logs.html` — activity and changelogs.
- Published `newlife2084.com` — the mask.
- Added `dump.html` — development notes and experiments.
- Published `dumpthis.sh` — narrative instrument.
- Published `Mar00n/prologue.html` — prologue content for the series.
- Added `about.html` — context and contact info.
- Created `index.html` — site root and landing page.
